AdditionalNotes: Resistant to diseases like apple scab and fireblight.
Requires a warm and humid climate.
Likes acidic soil, suitable for organic cultivation.
Rich in vitamin C and antioxidants.
Can be grown in colder climates with proper care.
Fruit is actually a berry, rich in potassium.
Many varieties are self-fertile but benefits from cross-pollination.
Fast-growing plant, bears fruit within 12-18 months.</s>
